plays.text: Goal scored by Dainius Zubrus assisted by Ken Klee

Penalty to Jason Doig 2 minutes for Crosschecking Stu Barnes
Goal scored by Miroslav Satan assisted by Alexei Zhitnik and Stu Barnes
Goal scored by Jaromir Jagr assisted by Michael Nylander and Kip Miller
Goal scored by Ivan Ciernik assisted by Calle Johansson
Goal scored by Vaclav Varada assisted by Alexei Zhitnik
Penalty to Sergei Gonchar 2 minutes for Hooking Taylor Pyatt
